title: 3 bed - Next to UC Berkeley; In Unit W/D; 2 months Free!
posting_body: Special move-in offer: 2 months free for a limited time!
Perched on the corner of Durant and Telegraph, 2500 Durant is situated at the center of UC Berkeley action!
Just 1 block from UC Berkeley, residents happily commute to campus and downtown Berkeley with ease.
Popular restaurants, shopping, and nightlife are at your fingertips in this unbeatable Berkeley location.

2500 Durant Ave boasts newly renovated units that are fully remodeled with refinished hardwood floors throughout, high end, white kitchens w/ energy-efficient, stainless steel appliances, and in-unit washer/dryers.
The apartments feature high ceilings and large windows, allowing for a spacious and open feel.
This rental community is pet-friendly, welcoming both cats and dogs at no extra charge.
- Flexible terms, Semester or 9 to 12 months!
